long_description: With stealth-fighter looks and comfortable upright positioning, the Cannondale Bad Boy 9 delivers a fine balance of speed, sturdiness and handling for commuting, fitness or everyday urban rides. 6061 aluminum frame lends itself to quick acceleration; upright geometry and flat handlebar offer a responsive, stable ride without feeling twitchy. Smooth-shifting Shimano 24-speed drivetrain lets you handle hills, cruise through concrete canyons and roll casually along riverside bike paths. Cannondale mechanical disc brakes make quick work of reducing speed, even in the rain. Fast and stable WTB Thick Slick tires offer smooth-rolling performance. Platform pedals mean no special bike shoes are required-just get on and pedal. Frame eyelets let you outfit the bike with fenders and a rear rack (not included). Specs on the Cannondale Bad Boy 9 bike are subject to change.
